item.title: IBRX
item.description: score:437 Chances: Recent publication of preclinical data in Science indicates potential for combination therapy to manage HIV without antiretroviral treatment. Phase 1 pilot study showed potential of N-803 combined with natural killer cells to reduce viral load in people living with HIV. Enrollment and initial follow-up completed for safety portions of a clinical trial studying ImmunityBioâ€™s investigational cancer vaccine and IL-15 superagonist for participants with Lynch syndrome.
